media:group.media:title: Blender 3.0 Beginner Donut Tutorial Part 16 (FINALE)
media:group.media:description:
Blender tutorial on saving your animation as an MP4. Also some tips for perfecting your donut before rendering.

My NFT mailing list: http://AndrewPrice.Art
Blender Donut subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/blenderdoughnuts

Chapters
0:00 Intro
2:44 Correct sprinkle size
4:15 Ideal sprinkle coloring
5:12 Sprinkle distance and rotation
7:24 Animation improvements
9:15 Floating sprinkle volume size
11:35 The f-Stop
13:13 Final file format
18:09 Compiling the video
23:58 Bakers Dozen NFT Teaser
25:01 What to do next?
